00033 using namespace std;
00034 using namespace affymetrix_calvin_io;
00035 using namespace affymetrix_calvin_parameter;
00036 
00037 /*! The data set index. */
00038 #define ENTRY_DATA_SET 0
00039 
00040 /*! The data group index. */
00041 #define ENTRY_DATA_GROUP 0
00042 
00043 /*! Probetset name and signal columns. */
00044 #define NAME_COLUMN 0
00045 #define ENTRY_COLUMN 1
00046 
00047 /*
00048  * Initialize any needed members.
00049  */
00050 CalvinCHPFileUpdater::CalvinCHPFileUpdater() : DataSetUpdater()
00051 {
00052         m_CHPFile = NULL;
00053 }
00054 
00055 /*
00056  * Clean up.
00057  */
00058 CalvinCHPFileUpdater::~CalvinCHPFileUpdater()
00059 {
00060         CloseCHPFile();
00061 }
00062 
00063 void CalvinCHPFileUpdater::Initialize(const char *file)
00064 {
00065     DataSetUpdater::Initialize(file);
00066     dataSetIndexMap.clear();
00067     dataGroupIndexMap.clear();
00068     std::map<std::wstring, MultiDataType> nameTypeMap;
00069     int nnames = sizeof(MultiDataDataSetNames) / sizeof(std::wstring);
00070     for (int iname=0; iname<nnames; iname++)
00071         nameTypeMap[MultiDataDataSetNames[iname]] = MultiDataDataTypes[iname];
00072     int ng = (int)dataSetNames.size();
00073     for (int ig=0; ig<ng; ig++)
00074     {
00075         int ns = (int)dataSetNames[ig].size();
00076         for (int is=0; is<ns; is++)
00077         {
00078             wstring &name = dataSetNames[ig][is];
00079             dataSetIndexMap[nameTypeMap[name]] = is;
00080             dataGroupIndexMap[nameTypeMap[name]] = ig;
00081         }
00082     }
00083 }
00084 
00085 void CalvinCHPFileUpdater::OpenCHPFile(const char *fileName)
00086 {
00087         CloseCHPFile();
00088         Initialize(fileName);
00089         m_CHPFile = new ofstream(fileName, ios::out | ios::in | ios::binary);
00090         if (!m_CHPFile) { Err::errAbort("CalvinCHPFileUpdater::OpenCHPFile() - Unable to open CHP file for updating: " + ToStr(fileName)); }
00091 }
00092 
00093 void CalvinCHPFileUpdater::UpdateExpressionQuantification(int row, float quantification)
00094 {
00095         SeekToPosition(*m_CHPFile, ENTRY_DATA_GROUP, ENTRY_DATA_SET, row, ENTRY_COLUMN);
00096         FileOutput::WriteFloat(*m_CHPFile, quantification);
00097 }
00098 
00099 void CalvinCHPFileUpdater::UpdateExpressionQuantificationBuffer(int row_start, std::vector<float> &expressionSignalBuffer)
00100 {
00101         // seek to start of update row (note NAME_COLUMN is 0)
00102         SeekToPosition(*m_CHPFile, ENTRY_DATA_GROUP, ENTRY_DATA_SET, row_start, NAME_COLUMN);
00103         int iProbeSetNameColumnSize = colsizes[ENTRY_DATA_GROUP][ENTRY_DATA_SET][NAME_COLUMN];
00104         for (int i=0; i<(int)expressionSignalBuffer.size(); i++) 
00105         {
00106                 m_CHPFile->seekp(iProbeSetNameColumnSize, std::ios::cur);
00107                 FileOutput::WriteFloat(*m_CHPFile, expressionSignalBuffer[i]);
00108         }
00109 }
00110 
00111 void CalvinCHPFileUpdater::UpdateExpressionQuantificationDetectionBuffer(int row_start, std::vector<std::pair<float,float> > &expressionSignalBuffer)
00112 {
00113         // seek to start of update row (note NAME_COLUMN is 0)
00114         SeekToPosition(*m_CHPFile, ENTRY_DATA_GROUP, ENTRY_DATA_SET, row_start, NAME_COLUMN);
00115         int iProbeSetNameColumnSize = colsizes[ENTRY_DATA_GROUP][ENTRY_DATA_SET][NAME_COLUMN];
00116         for (int i=0; i<(int)expressionSignalBuffer.size(); i++) 
00117         {
00118                 m_CHPFile->seekp(iProbeSetNameColumnSize, std::ios::cur);
00119                 FileOutput::WriteFloat(*m_CHPFile, expressionSignalBuffer[i].first);
00120                 FileOutput::WriteFloat(*m_CHPFile, expressionSignalBuffer[i].second);
00121         }
00122 }

00124 void CalvinCHPFileUpdater::UpdateGenotypeEntry(int row, u_int8_t call, float confidence, float RAS1, float RAS2, float aaCall, float abCall, float bbCall, float noCall)
00125 {
00126         SeekToPosition(*m_CHPFile, ENTRY_DATA_GROUP, ENTRY_DATA_SET, row, ENTRY_COLUMN);
00127         FileOutput::WriteUInt8(*m_CHPFile, call);
00128         FileOutput::WriteFloat(*m_CHPFile, confidence);
00129         FileOutput::WriteFloat(*m_CHPFile, RAS1);
00130         FileOutput::WriteFloat(*m_CHPFile, RAS2);
00131         FileOutput::WriteFloat(*m_CHPFile, aaCall);
00132         FileOutput::WriteFloat(*m_CHPFile, abCall);
00133         FileOutput::WriteFloat(*m_CHPFile, bbCall);
00134         FileOutput::WriteFloat(*m_CHPFile, noCall);
00135 }

00137 void CalvinCHPFileUpdater::UpdateGenotypeEntryBuffer(int row_start, const std::vector<CHPFileBufferWriter::GenotypeBufferEntry> &genotypeEntryBuffer)
00138 {
00139         // seek to start of update row (note NAME_COLUMN is 0)
00140         SeekToPosition(*m_CHPFile, ENTRY_DATA_GROUP, ENTRY_DATA_SET, row_start, NAME_COLUMN);
00141         int iProbeSetNameColumnSize = colsizes[ENTRY_DATA_GROUP][ENTRY_DATA_SET][NAME_COLUMN];
00142         for (int i=0; i<(int)genotypeEntryBuffer.size(); i++) 
00143         {
00144                 m_CHPFile->seekp(iProbeSetNameColumnSize, std::ios::cur);
00145                 FileOutput::WriteUInt8(*m_CHPFile, genotypeEntryBuffer[i].call);
00146                 FileOutput::WriteFloat(*m_CHPFile, genotypeEntryBuffer[i].confidence);
00147                 FileOutput::WriteFloat(*m_CHPFile, genotypeEntryBuffer[i].RAS1);
00148                 FileOutput::WriteFloat(*m_CHPFile, genotypeEntryBuffer[i].RAS2);
00149                 FileOutput::WriteFloat(*m_CHPFile, genotypeEntryBuffer[i].aaCall);
00150                 FileOutput::WriteFloat(*m_CHPFile, genotypeEntryBuffer[i].abCall);
00151                 FileOutput::WriteFloat(*m_CHPFile, genotypeEntryBuffer[i].bbCall);
00152                 FileOutput::WriteFloat(*m_CHPFile, genotypeEntryBuffer[i].noCall);
00153         }
00154 }
00155 
00156 void CalvinCHPFileUpdater::UpdateMultiDataGenotypeEntry(MultiDataType dataType, int row, const affymetrix_calvin_data::ProbeSetMultiDataGenotypeData &entry)
00157 {
00158     int dsIndex = dataSetIndexMap[dataType];
00159     int dgIndex = dataGroupIndexMap[dataType];
00160         SeekToPosition(*m_CHPFile, dgIndex, dsIndex, row, ENTRY_COLUMN);
00161         FileOutput::WriteUInt8(*m_CHPFile, entry.call);
00162         FileOutput::WriteFloat(*m_CHPFile, entry.confidence);
00163     UpdateMetrics(entry.metrics);
00164 }
00165 
00166 static int GetMetricBufferSize(const std::vector<affymetrix_calvin_parameter::ParameterNameValueType> &metrics)
00167 {
00168     int bufferSize = 0;
00169         int ncols = (int) metrics.size();
00170         for (int icol=0; icol<ncols; icol++)
00171         {
00172                 const ParameterNameValueType &nv = metrics[icol];
00173                 switch (nv.GetParameterType())
00174                 {
00175                         case ParameterNameValueType::Int8Type:
00176                                 bufferSize += sizeof(nv.GetValueInt8());
00177                                 break;
00178 
00179                         case ParameterNameValueType::UInt8Type:
00180                                 bufferSize += sizeof(nv.GetValueUInt8());
00181                                 break;
00182 
00183                         case ParameterNameValueType::Int16Type:
00184                                 bufferSize += sizeof(nv.GetValueInt16());
00185                                 break;
00186 
00187                         case ParameterNameValueType::UInt16Type:
00188                                 bufferSize += sizeof(nv.GetValueUInt16());
00189                                 break;
00190 
00191                         case ParameterNameValueType::Int32Type:
00192                                 bufferSize += sizeof(nv.GetValueInt32());
00193                                 break;
00194 
00195                         case ParameterNameValueType::UInt32Type:
00196                                 bufferSize += sizeof(nv.GetValueUInt32());
00197                                 break;
00198 
00199                         case ParameterNameValueType::FloatType:
00200                                 bufferSize += sizeof(nv.GetValueFloat());
00201                                 break;
00202 
00203                         case ParameterNameValueType::AsciiType:
00204                 bufferSize += sizeof(int);
00205                                 bufferSize += (int)(nv.GetValueAscii().length() * sizeof(char));
00206                                 break;
00207 
00208                         case ParameterNameValueType::TextType:
00209                 bufferSize += sizeof(int);
00210                                 bufferSize += (int)(nv.GetValueText().length() * sizeof(wchar_t));
00211                                 break;
00212             
00213             case ParameterNameValueType::UnknownType:
00214                 break;
00215                 }
00216         }
00217     return bufferSize;
00218 }
00219 
00220 static void CopyMetricToBuffer(const std::vector<affymetrix_calvin_parameter::ParameterNameValueType> &metrics, char * &pbuffer)
00221 {
00222         int ncols = (int) metrics.size();
00223         for (int icol=0; icol<ncols; icol++)
00224         {
00225                 const ParameterNameValueType &nv = metrics[icol];
00226                 switch (nv.GetParameterType())
00227                 {
00228                         case ParameterNameValueType::Int8Type:
00229                                 *pbuffer = nv.GetValueInt8();
00230                 pbuffer += sizeof(int8_t);
00231                                 break;
00232 
00233                         case ParameterNameValueType::UInt8Type:
00234                                 *pbuffer = nv.GetValueUInt8();
00235                 pbuffer += sizeof(u_int8_t);
00236                                 break;
00237 
00238                         case ParameterNameValueType::Int16Type:
00239                                 MmSetUInt16_N((uint16_t *)pbuffer, nv.GetValueInt16());
00240                 pbuffer += sizeof(int16_t);
00241                                 break;
00242 
00243                         case ParameterNameValueType::UInt16Type:
00244                                 MmSetUInt16_N((uint16_t *)pbuffer, nv.GetValueUInt16());
00245                 pbuffer += sizeof(u_int16_t);
00246                                 break;
00247 
00248                         case ParameterNameValueType::Int32Type:
00249                                 MmSetUInt32_N((uint32_t *)pbuffer, nv.GetValueInt32());
00250                 pbuffer += sizeof(int32_t);
00251                                 break;
00252 
00253                         case ParameterNameValueType::UInt32Type:
00254                                 MmSetUInt32_N((uint32_t *)pbuffer, nv.GetValueUInt32());
00255                 pbuffer += sizeof(u_int32_t);
00256                                 break;
00257 
00258                         case ParameterNameValueType::FloatType:
00259                                 MmSetFloat_N((float *)pbuffer, nv.GetValueFloat());
00260                 pbuffer += sizeof(float);
00261                                 break;
00262 
00263                         case ParameterNameValueType::AsciiType:
00264                         case ParameterNameValueType::TextType:
00265             case ParameterNameValueType::UnknownType:
00266                 break;
00267                 }
00268         }
00269 }
00270 
00271 void CalvinCHPFileUpdater::UpdateDmetBiAllelicEntry(MultiDataType dataType, int row, const affymetrix_calvin_data::DmetBiAllelicData &entry)
00272 {
00273         int dsIndex = dataSetIndexMap[dataType];
00274     int dgIndex = dataGroupIndexMap[dataType];
00275         SeekToPosition(*m_CHPFile, dgIndex, dsIndex, row, ENTRY_COLUMN);
00276         FileOutput::WriteUInt8(*m_CHPFile, entry.call);
00277         FileOutput::WriteFloat(*m_CHPFile, entry.confidence);
00278         FileOutput::WriteUInt8(*m_CHPFile, entry.force);
00279         FileOutput::WriteFloat(*m_CHPFile, entry.signalA);
00280         FileOutput::WriteFloat(*m_CHPFile, entry.signalB);
00281         FileOutput::WriteUInt8(*m_CHPFile, entry.contextA);
00282         FileOutput::WriteUInt8(*m_CHPFile, entry.contextB);
00283         UpdateMetrics(entry.metrics);
00284 }
00285 
00286 void CalvinCHPFileUpdater::UpdateDmetBiAllelicEntryBuffer(MultiDataType dataType, int rowStart, const std::vector<affymetrix_calvin_data::DmetBiAllelicData> &entryBuffer)
00287 {
00288         if (entryBuffer.size() == 0)
00289         {
00290                 return;
00291         }
00292         // seek to start of update row (note NAME_COLUMN is 0)
00293         int dsIndex = dataSetIndexMap[dataType];
00294     int dgIndex = dataGroupIndexMap[dataType];
00295         SeekToPosition(*m_CHPFile, dgIndex, dsIndex, rowStart, NAME_COLUMN);
00296 
00297         // Create a buffer for writing.
00298         int iProbeSetNameColumnSize = colsizes[dgIndex][dsIndex][NAME_COLUMN];
00299         int len = iProbeSetNameColumnSize - sizeof(int);
00300         int bufferSize = iProbeSetNameColumnSize + 
00301                 sizeof(entryBuffer[0].call) + 
00302                 sizeof(entryBuffer[0].confidence) + 
00303                 sizeof(entryBuffer[0].force) + 
00304                 sizeof(entryBuffer[0].signalA) + 
00305                 sizeof(entryBuffer[0].signalB) + 
00306                 sizeof(entryBuffer[0].contextA) + 
00307                 sizeof(entryBuffer[0].contextB) + 
00308                 GetMetricBufferSize(entryBuffer[0].metrics);
00309         bufferSize *= (int)entryBuffer.size();
00310         char *buffer = new char[bufferSize];
00311         memset(buffer, 0, bufferSize);
00312 
00313         // Copy the data to the buffer
00314         char *pbuffer = buffer;
00315         for (int i = 0; i<(int)entryBuffer.size(); i++) 
00316         {
00317                 MmSetUInt32_N((uint32_t*)pbuffer, len);
00318                 pbuffer += sizeof(int);
00319                 memcpy(pbuffer, entryBuffer[i].name.c_str(), entryBuffer[i].name.length());
00320                 pbuffer += len;
00321                 MmSetUInt8((uint8_t*)pbuffer, entryBuffer[i].call);
00322                 pbuffer += sizeof(uint8_t);
00323                 MmSetFloat_N((float *)pbuffer, entryBuffer[i].confidence);
00324                 pbuffer += sizeof(float);
00325                 MmSetUInt8((uint8_t*)pbuffer, entryBuffer[i].force);
00326                 pbuffer += sizeof(uint8_t);
00327                 MmSetFloat_N((float *)pbuffer, entryBuffer[i].signalA);
00328                 pbuffer += sizeof(float);
00329                 MmSetFloat_N((float *)pbuffer, entryBuffer[i].signalB);
00330                 pbuffer += sizeof(float);
00331                 MmSetUInt8((uint8_t*)pbuffer, entryBuffer[i].contextA);
00332                 pbuffer += sizeof(uint8_t);
00333                 MmSetUInt8((uint8_t*)pbuffer, entryBuffer[i].contextB);
00334                 pbuffer += sizeof(uint8_t);
00335                 CopyMetricToBuffer(entryBuffer[i].metrics, pbuffer);
00336         }
00337         // Write the buffer.
00338         m_CHPFile->write(buffer, bufferSize);
00339         delete[] buffer;
00340         buffer = NULL;
00341 }
00342 
00343 void CalvinCHPFileUpdater::UpdateDmetBiAllelicEntryBuffer(MultiDataType dataType, int rowStart, int bufferEntrySize, const std::vector<char*> &entryBuffer)
00344 {
00345         if (entryBuffer.size() == 0)
00346         {
00347                 return;
00348         }
00349         // Copy the data to the buffer
00350         int bufferSize = bufferEntrySize * (int)entryBuffer.size();
00351         char *buffer = new char[bufferSize];
00352         memset(buffer, 0, bufferSize);
00353         char *pbuffer = buffer;
00354         for (int i=0; i<(int)entryBuffer.size(); i++) 
00355         {
00356                 memcpy(pbuffer, entryBuffer[i], bufferEntrySize);
00357                 pbuffer += bufferEntrySize;
00358         }
00359 
00360         // seek to start of update row (note NAME_COLUMN is 0)
00361         int dsIndex = dataSetIndexMap[dataType];
00362     int dgIndex = dataGroupIndexMap[dataType];
00363         SeekToPosition(*m_CHPFile, dgIndex, dsIndex, rowStart, NAME_COLUMN);
00364 
00365         // Write the buffer.
00366         m_CHPFile->write(buffer, bufferSize);
00367         delete[] buffer;
00368         buffer = NULL;
00369 }

00371 void CalvinCHPFileUpdater::UpdateDmetCopyNumberEntry(MultiDataType dataType, int row, const affymetrix_calvin_data::DmetCopyNumberData &entry)
00372 {
00373         int dsIndex = dataSetIndexMap[dataType];
00374     int dgIndex = dataGroupIndexMap[dataType];
00375         SeekToPosition(*m_CHPFile, dgIndex, dsIndex, row, ENTRY_COLUMN);
00376         FileOutput::WriteInt16(*m_CHPFile, entry.call);
00377         FileOutput::WriteFloat(*m_CHPFile, entry.confidence);
00378         FileOutput::WriteInt16(*m_CHPFile, entry.force);
00379         FileOutput::WriteFloat(*m_CHPFile, entry.estimate);
00380         FileOutput::WriteFloat(*m_CHPFile, entry.lower);
00381         FileOutput::WriteFloat(*m_CHPFile, entry.upper);
00382         UpdateMetrics(entry.metrics);
00383 }

00385 void CalvinCHPFileUpdater::UpdateDmetCopyNumberEntryBuffer(MultiDataType dataType, int rowStart, const std::vector<affymetrix_calvin_data::DmetCopyNumberData> &entryBuffer)
00386 {
00387         if (entryBuffer.size() == 0)
00388         {
00389                 return;
00390         }
00391         // seek to start of update row (note NAME_COLUMN is 0)
00392         int dsIndex = dataSetIndexMap[dataType];
00393     int dgIndex = dataGroupIndexMap[dataType];
00394         SeekToPosition(*m_CHPFile, dgIndex, dsIndex, rowStart, NAME_COLUMN);
00395 
00396         // Create a buffer for writing.
00397         int iProbeSetNameColumnSize = colsizes[dgIndex][dsIndex][NAME_COLUMN];
00398         int len = iProbeSetNameColumnSize - sizeof(int);
00399         int bufferSize = iProbeSetNameColumnSize + 
00400                 sizeof(entryBuffer[0].call) + 
00401                 sizeof(entryBuffer[0].confidence) + 
00402                 sizeof(entryBuffer[0].force) + 
00403                 sizeof(entryBuffer[0].estimate) + 
00404                 sizeof(entryBuffer[0].lower) + 
00405                 sizeof(entryBuffer[0].upper) + 
00406                 GetMetricBufferSize(entryBuffer[0].metrics);
00407         bufferSize *= (int)entryBuffer.size();
00408         char *buffer = new char[bufferSize];
00409         memset(buffer, 0, bufferSize);
00410 
00411         // Copy the data to the buffer
00412         char *pbuffer = buffer;
00413         for (int i = 0; i<(int)entryBuffer.size(); i++) 
00414         {
00415                 MmSetUInt32_N((uint32_t*)pbuffer, len);
00416                 pbuffer += sizeof(int);
00417                 memcpy(pbuffer, entryBuffer[i].name.c_str(), entryBuffer[i].name.length());
00418                 pbuffer += len;
00419                 MmSetUInt16_N((uint16_t*)pbuffer, entryBuffer[i].call);
00420                 pbuffer += sizeof(uint16_t);
00421                 MmSetFloat_N((float*)pbuffer, entryBuffer[i].confidence);
00422                 pbuffer += sizeof(float);
00423                 MmSetUInt16_N((uint16_t*)pbuffer, entryBuffer[i].force);
00424                 pbuffer += sizeof(uint16_t);
00425                 MmSetFloat_N((float*)pbuffer, entryBuffer[i].estimate);
00426                 pbuffer += sizeof(float);
00427                 MmSetFloat_N((float*)pbuffer, entryBuffer[i].lower);
00428                 pbuffer += sizeof(float);
00429                 MmSetFloat_N((float*)pbuffer, entryBuffer[i].upper);
00430                 pbuffer += sizeof(float);
00431                 CopyMetricToBuffer(entryBuffer[i].metrics, pbuffer);
00432         }
00433         // Write the buffer.
00434         m_CHPFile->write(buffer, bufferSize);
00435         delete[] buffer;
00436         buffer = NULL;
00437 }

00467 void CalvinCHPFileUpdater::UpdateDmetMultiAllelicEntry(MultiDataType dataType, int row, const affymetrix_calvin_data::DmetMultiAllelicData &entry)
00468 {
00469         int dsIndex = dataSetIndexMap[dataType];
00470     int dgIndex = dataGroupIndexMap[dataType];
00471         SeekToPosition(*m_CHPFile, dgIndex, dsIndex, row, ENTRY_COLUMN);
00472         FileOutput::WriteUInt8(*m_CHPFile, entry.call);
00473         FileOutput::WriteFloat(*m_CHPFile, entry.confidence);
00474         FileOutput::WriteUInt8(*m_CHPFile, entry.force);
00475         FileOutput::WriteUInt8(*m_CHPFile, entry.alleleCount);
00476         FileOutput::WriteFloat(*m_CHPFile, entry.signalA);
00477         FileOutput::WriteFloat(*m_CHPFile, entry.signalB);
00478         FileOutput::WriteFloat(*m_CHPFile, entry.signalC);
00479         FileOutput::WriteFloat(*m_CHPFile, entry.signalD);
00480         FileOutput::WriteFloat(*m_CHPFile, entry.signalE);
00481         FileOutput::WriteFloat(*m_CHPFile, entry.signalF);
00482         FileOutput::WriteUInt8(*m_CHPFile, entry.contextA);
00483         FileOutput::WriteUInt8(*m_CHPFile, entry.contextB);
00484         FileOutput::WriteUInt8(*m_CHPFile, entry.contextC);
00485         FileOutput::WriteUInt8(*m_CHPFile, entry.contextD);
00486         FileOutput::WriteUInt8(*m_CHPFile, entry.contextE);
00487         FileOutput::WriteUInt8(*m_CHPFile, entry.contextF);
00488         UpdateMetrics(entry.metrics);
00489 }

00491 void CalvinCHPFileUpdater::UpdateDmetMultiAllelicEntryBuffer(MultiDataType dataType, int rowStart, const std::vector<affymetrix_calvin_data::DmetMultiAllelicData> &entryBuffer)
00492 {
00493         if (entryBuffer.size() == 0)
00494         {
00495                 return;
00496         }
00497         // seek to start of update row (note NAME_COLUMN is 0)
00498         int dsIndex = dataSetIndexMap[dataType];
00499     int dgIndex = dataGroupIndexMap[dataType];
00500         SeekToPosition(*m_CHPFile, dgIndex, dsIndex, rowStart, NAME_COLUMN);
00501 
00502         // Create a buffer for writing.
00503         int iProbeSetNameColumnSize = colsizes[dgIndex][dsIndex][NAME_COLUMN];
00504         int len = iProbeSetNameColumnSize - sizeof(int);
00505         int bufferSize = iProbeSetNameColumnSize + 
00506                 sizeof(entryBuffer[0].call) + 
00507                 sizeof(entryBuffer[0].confidence) + 
00508                 sizeof(entryBuffer[0].force) + 
00509                 sizeof(entryBuffer[0].alleleCount) + 
00510                 sizeof(entryBuffer[0].signalA) + 
00511                 sizeof(entryBuffer[0].signalB) + 
00512                 sizeof(entryBuffer[0].signalC) + 
00513                 sizeof(entryBuffer[0].signalD) + 
00514                 sizeof(entryBuffer[0].signalE) + 
00515                 sizeof(entryBuffer[0].signalF) + 
00516                 sizeof(entryBuffer[0].contextA) + 
00517                 sizeof(entryBuffer[0].contextB) + 
00518                 sizeof(entryBuffer[0].contextC) + 
00519                 sizeof(entryBuffer[0].contextD) + 
00520                 sizeof(entryBuffer[0].contextE) + 
00521                 sizeof(entryBuffer[0].contextF) + 
00522                 GetMetricBufferSize(entryBuffer[0].metrics);
00523         bufferSize *= (int)entryBuffer.size();
00524         char *buffer = new char[bufferSize];
00525         memset(buffer, 0, bufferSize);
00526 
00527         // Copy the data to the buffer
00528         char *pbuffer = buffer;
00529         for (int i = 0; i<(int)entryBuffer.size(); i++) 
00530         {
00531                 MmSetUInt32_N((uint32_t*)pbuffer, len);
00532                 pbuffer += sizeof(int);
00533                 memcpy(pbuffer, entryBuffer[i].name.c_str(), entryBuffer[i].name.length());
00534                 pbuffer += len;
00535                 MmSetUInt8((uint8_t*)pbuffer, entryBuffer[i].call);
00536                 pbuffer += sizeof(uint8_t);
00537                 MmSetFloat_N((float*)pbuffer, entryBuffer[i].confidence);
00538                 pbuffer += sizeof(float);
00539                 MmSetUInt8((uint8_t*)pbuffer, entryBuffer[i].force);
00540                 pbuffer += sizeof(uint8_t);
00541                 MmSetUInt8((uint8_t*)pbuffer, entryBuffer[i].alleleCount);
00542                 pbuffer += sizeof(uint8_t);
00543                 MmSetFloat_N((float*)pbuffer, entryBuffer[i].signalA);
00544                 pbuffer += sizeof(float);
00545                 MmSetFloat_N((float*)pbuffer, entryBuffer[i].signalB);
00546                 pbuffer += sizeof(float);
00547                 MmSetFloat_N((float*)pbuffer, entryBuffer[i].signalC);
00548                 pbuffer += sizeof(float);
00549                 MmSetFloat_N((float*)pbuffer, entryBuffer[i].signalD);
00550                 pbuffer += sizeof(float);
00551                 MmSetFloat_N((float*)pbuffer, entryBuffer[i].signalE);
00552                 pbuffer += sizeof(float);
00553                 MmSetFloat_N((float*)pbuffer, entryBuffer[i].signalF);
00554                 pbuffer += sizeof(float);
00555                 MmSetUInt8((uint8_t*)pbuffer, entryBuffer[i].contextA);
00556                 pbuffer += sizeof(uint8_t);
00557                 MmSetUInt8((uint8_t*)pbuffer, entryBuffer[i].contextB);
00558                 pbuffer += sizeof(uint8_t);
00559                 MmSetUInt8((uint8_t*)pbuffer, entryBuffer[i].contextC);
00560                 pbuffer += sizeof(uint8_t);
00561                 MmSetUInt8((uint8_t*)pbuffer, entryBuffer[i].contextD);
00562                 pbuffer += sizeof(uint8_t);
00563                 MmSetUInt8((uint8_t*)pbuffer, entryBuffer[i].contextE);
00564                 pbuffer += sizeof(uint8_t);
00565                 MmSetUInt8((uint8_t*)pbuffer, entryBuffer[i].contextF);
00566                 pbuffer += sizeof(uint8_t);
00567                 CopyMetricToBuffer(entryBuffer[i].metrics, pbuffer);
00568         }
00569         // Write the buffer.
00570         m_CHPFile->write(buffer, bufferSize);
00571         delete[] buffer;
00572         buffer = NULL;
00573 }
00574 
00575 void CalvinCHPFileUpdater::UpdateDmetMultiAllelicEntryBuffer(MultiDataType dataType, int rowStart, int bufferEntrySize, const std::vector<char*> &entryBuffer)
00576 {
00577         if (entryBuffer.size() == 0)
00578                 return;
00579 
00580     // Copy the data to the buffer
00581         int bufferSize = bufferEntrySize * (int)entryBuffer.size();
00582         char *buffer = new char[bufferSize];
00583         memset(buffer, 0, bufferSize);
00584         char *pbuffer = buffer;
00585         for (int i=0; i<(int)entryBuffer.size(); i++) 
00586         {
00587                 memcpy(pbuffer, entryBuffer[i], bufferEntrySize);
00588                 pbuffer += bufferEntrySize;
00589         }
00590 
00591         // seek to start of update row (note NAME_COLUMN is 0)
00592         int dsIndex = dataSetIndexMap[dataType];
00593     int dgIndex = dataGroupIndexMap[dataType];
00594         SeekToPosition(*m_CHPFile, dgIndex, dsIndex, rowStart, NAME_COLUMN);
00595 
00596         // Write the buffer.
00597         m_CHPFile->write(buffer, bufferSize);
00598         delete[] buffer;
00599         buffer = NULL;
00600 }

00602 void CalvinCHPFileUpdater::UpdateMultiDataGenotypeEntryBuffer(MultiDataType dataType, int row_start, const std::vector<affymetrix_calvin_data::ProbeSetMultiDataGenotypeData> &genotypeEntryBuffer)
00603 {
00604     if (genotypeEntryBuffer.size() == 0)
00605         return;
00606 
00607         // seek to start of update row (note NAME_COLUMN is 0)
00608     int dsIndex = dataSetIndexMap[dataType];
00609     int dgIndex = dataGroupIndexMap[dataType];
00610         SeekToPosition(*m_CHPFile, dgIndex, dsIndex, row_start, NAME_COLUMN);
00611 
00612     // Create a buffer for writing.
00613         int iProbeSetNameColumnSize = colsizes[dgIndex][dsIndex][NAME_COLUMN];
00614     int len = iProbeSetNameColumnSize - sizeof(int);
00615     int bufferSize = iProbeSetNameColumnSize + sizeof(genotypeEntryBuffer[0].call) + sizeof(genotypeEntryBuffer[0].confidence) + GetMetricBufferSize(genotypeEntryBuffer[0].metrics);
00616     bufferSize *= (int)genotypeEntryBuffer.size();
00617     char *buffer = new char[bufferSize];
00618     memset(buffer, 0, bufferSize);
00619 
00620     // Copy the data to the buffer
00621     char *pbuffer = buffer;
00622     for (int i=0; i<(int)genotypeEntryBuffer.size(); i++) 
00623     {
00624         MmSetUInt32_N((uint32_t *)pbuffer, len);
00625         pbuffer += sizeof(int);
00626         memcpy(pbuffer, genotypeEntryBuffer[i].name.c_str(), genotypeEntryBuffer[i].name.length());
00627         pbuffer += len;
00628         *pbuffer = genotypeEntryBuffer[i].call;
00629         pbuffer += sizeof(char);
00630         MmSetFloat_N((float *)pbuffer, genotypeEntryBuffer[i].confidence);
00631         pbuffer += sizeof(float);
00632         CopyMetricToBuffer(genotypeEntryBuffer[i].metrics, pbuffer);
00633     }
00634 
00635     // Write the buffer.
00636     m_CHPFile->write(buffer, bufferSize);
00637     delete[] buffer;
00638     buffer = NULL;
00639 }

00751 void CalvinCHPFileUpdater::UpdateMultiDataExpressionEntry(MultiDataType dataType, int row, const affymetrix_calvin_data::ProbeSetMultiDataExpressionData &entry)
00752 {
00753     int dsIndex = dataSetIndexMap[dataType];
00754     int dgIndex = dataGroupIndexMap[dataType];
00755         SeekToPosition(*m_CHPFile, dgIndex, dsIndex, row, ENTRY_COLUMN);
00756         FileOutput::WriteFloat(*m_CHPFile, entry.quantification);
00757     UpdateMetrics(entry.metrics);
00758 }

00760 void CalvinCHPFileUpdater::UpdateMultiDataExpressionEntryBuffer(MultiDataType dataType, int row_start, const std::vector<affymetrix_calvin_data::ProbeSetMultiDataExpressionData> &expressionEntryBuffer)
00761 {
00762         // seek to start of update row (note NAME_COLUMN is 0)
00763     int dsIndex = dataSetIndexMap[dataType];
00764     int dgIndex = dataGroupIndexMap[dataType];
00765         SeekToPosition(*m_CHPFile, dgIndex, dsIndex, row_start, NAME_COLUMN);
00766         int iProbeSetNameColumnSize = colsizes[dgIndex][dsIndex][NAME_COLUMN];
00767         for (int i=0; i<(int)expressionEntryBuffer.size(); i++) 
00768         {
00769                 m_CHPFile->seekp(iProbeSetNameColumnSize, std::ios::cur);
00770                 FileOutput::WriteFloat(*m_CHPFile, expressionEntryBuffer[i].quantification);
00771         UpdateMetrics(expressionEntryBuffer[i].metrics);
00772     }
00773 }

00992 
00993 void CalvinCHPFileUpdater::UpdateMetrics(const std::vector<affymetrix_calvin_parameter::ParameterNameValueType> &metrics)
00994 {
00995         int ncols = (int) metrics.size();
00996         for (int icol=0; icol<ncols; icol++)
00997         {
00998         const ParameterNameValueType &nv = metrics[icol];
00999                 switch (nv.GetParameterType())
01000                 {
01001                         case ParameterNameValueType::Int8Type:
01002                 FileOutput::WriteInt8(*m_CHPFile, nv.GetValueInt8());
01003                                 break;
01004 
01005                         case ParameterNameValueType::UInt8Type:
01006                                 FileOutput::WriteUInt8(*m_CHPFile, nv.GetValueUInt8());
01007                                 break;
01008 
01009                         case ParameterNameValueType::Int16Type:
01010                                 FileOutput::WriteInt16(*m_CHPFile, nv.GetValueInt16());
01011                                 break;
01012 
01013                         case ParameterNameValueType::UInt16Type:
01014                                 FileOutput::WriteUInt16(*m_CHPFile, nv.GetValueUInt16());
01015                                 break;
01016 
01017                         case ParameterNameValueType::Int32Type:
01018                                 FileOutput::WriteInt32(*m_CHPFile, nv.GetValueInt32());
01019                                 break;
01020 
01021                         case ParameterNameValueType::UInt32Type:
01022                                 FileOutput::WriteUInt32(*m_CHPFile, nv.GetValueUInt32());
01023                                 break;
01024 
01025                         case ParameterNameValueType::FloatType:
01026                                 FileOutput::WriteFloat(*m_CHPFile, nv.GetValueFloat());
01027                                 break;
01028 
01029                         case ParameterNameValueType::AsciiType:
01030                                 FileOutput::WriteString8(*m_CHPFile, nv.GetValueAscii());
01031                                 break;
01032 
01033                         case ParameterNameValueType::TextType:
01034                 FileOutput::WriteString16(*m_CHPFile, nv.GetValueText());
01035                                 break;
01036         // @todo Check that this is ok.
01037     case ParameterNameValueType::UnknownType:
01038       break;
01039                 }
01040         }
01041 }
01042 
01043 void CalvinCHPFileUpdater::CloseCHPFile()
01044 {
01045         if (m_CHPFile != NULL)
01046         {
01047                 if (m_CHPFile->is_open() == true) { m_CHPFile->close(); }
01048                 delete m_CHPFile;
01049                 m_CHPFile = NULL;
01050         }
01051     dataSetIndexMap.clear();
01052     dataGroupIndexMap.clear();
01053 }
